argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | clmvs1.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | clmvs1.s | |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Scalar ` W ) = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_clm1 | |- ( W e. CMod -> 1 = ( 1r ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( W e. CMod /\ X e. V ) -> 1 = ( 1r ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ( W e. CMod /\ X e. V ) -> ( 1 .x. X ) = ( ( 1r ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) .x. X ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_clmlmod | |- ( W e. CMod -> W e. LMod ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1r ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) = ( 1r ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 3, 2, 8 | #P_lmodvs1 | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) -> ( ( 1r ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) .x. X ) = X ) |
| 10 | 7, 9 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( W e. CMod /\ X e. V ) -> ( ( 1r ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) .x. X ) = X ) |
| 11 | 6, 10 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( W e. CMod /\ X e. V ) -> ( 1 .x. X ) = X ) |
